TopicTitle: American Pack, what's the status on that?

Articles.Content: I enjoyed a mod called American Pack a while ago. It had versions from the American Constellation program, along with a few other bits. Is that mod still around/being updated? I really liked the Altair lander and the rover and would love to use them with .24.
I have the pack with some files missing. I think its the latest version. PM me if you want it.

It was made by Bobcat, http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24724-0-22-X-BobCat-ind-Historical-spacecraft-thread, he has a new thread at http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/81754-Release-BobCat-Ind-Space-Planet-products and appears to be redoing it all with Dragon1 doing the American pack on the same thread. He hasn't released it yet, but he seems to be close to finished.
